Package io.github.cardsandhuskers.teams.objects

Class Team

java.lang.Object
io.github.cardsandhuskers.teams.objects.Team
public class Team extends Object
Team object that holds data and methods for each team. color member is public and may be made private with a getter in the future to prevent it from being assigned
